title.rendered: Mrs. India – Empress of the Nation partners with Smile Foundation for She Can Fly initiative

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation has collaborated with Mrs. India – Empress of the Nation 2018 which was held on 9th September in Pune. Smile Foundation was the Beauty with Purpose partner for the event. Through this partnership Mrs. India-Empress of the Nation will help raise awareness about the importance of education for the girl child through Smile Foundation’s She Can Fly campaign. This is also an initiative to sensitize the masses about giving equal opportunities to girls in every walk of life. Through this event they are supporting education for 84 kids for a year.

Smile Foundation’s initiative ‘She Can Fly’ is an effort to enable, equip and empower girl children with quality education, proper nutrition, good health, adequate skills, and above all a lot of self-confidence to help them live their lives to their fullest potential.

Smile Foundation is a national level development organisation directly benefitting over 400,000 children and their families every year, through more than 200 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
